quest.name: The Ore the Merrier
journal:
 Quest Sync
Eukleides eyes you curiously.
objectives: Use the Hypnos potions on oreiai and capture them.
Deliver the oreiai to the graceful observer.

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: Hm? A visitor touring our facility, are you? If you wish, you can assist us with one of our latest arrivals─the oreias.

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: The creatures are identifiable by their long ears, which they use to detect danger. They're also keenly attuned to minerals, and can find deposits even in pitch darkness.

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: Now, we were just testing the effect of minerals on them when they reacted acutely to manastone. Becoming visibly agitated, they each grabbed a stone and scurried off.

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: We need to round them up again, and could use a helping hand. If you are up for it, please seek out my colleague who is out searching. She should be somewhere between here and First Bloom, and can give you instructions.

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: If you wish to help us round up the oreiai, please seek out my colleague who is out searching.

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: She should be somewhere between here and First Bloom, and can give you instructions.

dialogue.name: ELPISOBSERVER04276
dialogue.text: Come to help us find the oreiai, you say? We're much obliged.

dialogue.name: ELPISOBSERVER04276
dialogue.text: Three of the critters have been sighted yonder.

dialogue.name: ELPISOBSERVER04276
dialogue.text: When you find one, use this Hypnos potion on it. It should put it to sleep and allow you to easily capture it.

dialogue.name: ELPISOBSERVER04276
dialogue.text: Should the potion fail to work, as it occasionally does, you can simply exhaust the creature into submission.

dialogue.name: ELPISOBSERVER04276
dialogue.text: When you find an oreias, use the Hypnos potion on it. It should put it to sleep and allow you to easily capture it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You should use the Hypnos potion on the oreias before you attempt to capture it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The oreias quickly falls asleep.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The oreias tries to fight the potion, but eventually succumbs.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The oreias is too agitated─the potion has no effect!

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: How are you faring with the oreiai?

dialogue.name: ELPISOBSERVER04276
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are. Were you able to catch the oreiai?

dialogue.name: ELPISOBSERVER04276
dialogue.text: Thank you! Now only two of the critters remain at large.

dialogue.name: ELPISOBSERVER04276
dialogue.text: I've received word that they've been sighted in another area, so I will hurry there at once.

dialogue.name: ELPISOBSERVER04276
dialogue.text: In the meantime, I'd be grateful if you could take the three fellows you caught back to Eukleides.

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: Oh, 'tis you again. How did you fare with the oreiai?

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: Well now, that you should bring the creatures yourself... I hope they didn't give you too much trouble.

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: Their abnormal behavior was most certainly caused by the power harbored in manastone.

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: Still, we have the highest hopes for the oreias. In their digging for minerals, they prime the earth for plant life.

dialogue.name: EUKLEIDES
dialogue.text: If we suppress their sensitivity to magical influence, theirs will surely be a beneficial existence to the star. And you, my friend, can be proud in having helped to bring them forth.
